item.title: ADB CLI: Connect and Debug Android Devices
item.description: Android Debug Bridge (ADB) is a versatile command-line tool that lets you communicate with an Android-powered device. ADB provides various device actions, such as installing and debugging apps, and it offers access to a Unix shell that you can use to run commands on a device.
